attributes.action: Provide an unlimitted guarantee for all UK Bank Accounts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of October 5, 2008, the Irish and German governments have responded to the  distrust that now exists between  Bankers by providing an unlimited guarantee of all consumer bank accounts in their countries.
As a Chancellor who claimed the credit for UK prosperity when the economy was on a positive course, the very least he can do is to provide the same  unlimited guarantee for all UK Bank Accounts while the UK economy declines under his stewardship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
